offload

public int offload(FlexibleResource res,
                   Resource nodeFreeReserve)
Identify and transfer some parts consuming a certain amount of resources

Parameters:
res - FlexibleResource that has to be offloaded from this node.
nodeFreeReserve - The minimum amount of resources that should be left free on each destination node.
Returns:
number of partitions that were offloaded.

offload

public int offload(FlexibleResource res)
Offload partitions with no constraint on free resources on destination nodes.

This is equivalent to offloadPartitions(res, null)

Parameters:
res - resources to shed from this node.
